Package org.astrogrid.community.webapp

Class Summary
AccountAdminServlet A servlet to update or delete user-accounts.
AccountBean A Java bean to give acccess to account details.
AccountServlet A servlet to handle requests for account details.
CaServlet A servlet to operate the certificate authority (CA).
DatabaseServlet A servlet to report on the health of the community database.
EmailListServlet A servlet to generate an email-address list of all members of the community.
NewAccountServlet A servlet to add a basic account to the user database.
PasswordChangeServlet A servlet to respond to password-change requests.
PropertiesSelfTest JUnit tests on the settings of community properties.
